title: Create Your First CLAUDE.md
description: Learn to create a CLAUDE.md file to give Claude Code context about your project. This is the foundation of customizing Claude's behavior.

initialFiles.content:
# Challenge: Create Your First CLAUDE.md

Every good project should have a CLAUDE.md file to help Claude Code understand it.

## Objectives
1. Create a CLAUDE.md file in the project root
2. Describe what this project does
3. Add basic commands (build, test, run)

hints.text: CLAUDE.md is a markdown file that tells Claude Code about your project - what it does, how to build it, etc.
Try: 'Create a CLAUDE.md file describing this React todo app and its npm commands'
Ask: 'Create CLAUDE.md for this project. Include: 1) What the app does (React todo app) 2) How to run it (npm run dev) 3) How to build (npm run build) 4) How to test (npm test)'

solution.approach: Create a CLAUDE.md file with project description and common commands.
solution.example: Create a CLAUDE.md file explaining this is a React todo app with its build commands
alternativeApproaches: Document this project for Claude Code

learningPoints: CLAUDE.md provides project context to Claude Code
Include project purpose, tech stack, and common commands
Claude reads CLAUDE.md automatically when working in a project
